# ReStrictUI

This is the documentation for the `@restrictui/components` package. It contains a collection of components and utilities for building user interfaces in React. The library is designed to be composable and styling agnostic.

## Getting Started
- [Introduction](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/index.md): Get started with ReStrictUI - a comprehensive React component library designed for modern web applications.
- [Installation](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/installation.md): Step-by-step guide to install ReStrictUI in your React project with npm, yarn, or pnpm.
- [Registry](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/registry.md): Learn how to use the ReStrictUI Registry with shadcn/ui.
- [MCP](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/mcp.md): Learn how to use the shadcn MCP(Model Context Protocol) with ReStrictUI
- [Theming](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/theming.md): Customize ReStrictUI components with CSS variables, Tailwind CSS, or your preferred styling solution.
- [Dark mode](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/dark-mode.md): Implement automatic dark mode switching with ReStrictUI components using next-themes or custom solutions.
- [RTL](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/rtl.md): Enable right-to-left language support for ReStrictUI components in Arabic, Hebrew, and other RTL languages.
- [References](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/references.md): 3rd-party component libraries and tool used to build ReStrictUI.
- [Changelog](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/changelog.md): Detailed changelog tracking new features, bug fixes, and breaking changes across ReStrictUI versions.
- [llms.txt](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/llms.txt.md): Structured data file for AI assistants and language models to understand ReStrictUI components.

## UI Components
- [Alert](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/alert.md): Display contextual feedback messages with multiple variants including success, warning, error, and info states.
- [Calendar](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/calendar.md): Interactive date picker with month navigation, date selection, and customizable date ranges for scheduling interfaces.
- [Card](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/card.md): Flexible container component for displaying content with headers, footers, and customizable layouts.
- [Chart](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/chart.md): Data visualization component built on Recharts with support for line, bar, pie, and area charts.
- [Data Grid](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/data-grid.md): Advanced managed table component build with TanStack Table with sorting, filtering, pagination, and row selection for complex data management.
- [Drawer](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/drawer.md): Slide-out panel component that appears from the side with overlay and customizable positioning.
- [File Upload](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/file-upload.md): Drag-and-drop file upload component with progress indicators, file validation, and multiple file support.
- [Kanban](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/kanban.md): Project management board with draggable cards, customizable columns, and real-time updates.
- [Kbd](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/kbd.md): Keyboard key indicator component for displaying keyboard shortcuts and key combinations.
- [Pagination](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/pagination.md): Navigate through large datasets with page numbers, previous/next buttons, and customizable page sizes.
- [Resizable](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/resizable.md): Create resizable panels and layouts with drag handles and customizable resize constraints.
- [Rating](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/rating.md): Interactive star rating component for collecting user feedback with half-star support and custom icons.
- [Stepper](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/stepper.md): Multi-step process component with progress indicators, step validation, and customizable navigation.
- [Scrollspy](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/scrollspy.md): Navigation component that highlights menu items based on scroll position for long-form content.
- [Skeleton](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/skeleton.md): Loading placeholder component that mimics content structure while data is being fetched.
- [Sortable](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/sortable.md): Drag-and-drop list component for reordering items with visual feedback and accessibility support.
- [Sonner](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/sonner.md): Toast notification system with multiple positions, types, and customizable animations.
- [Table](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/table.md): Structured data display component with sorting, filtering, and responsive design for tabular information.
- [Textarea](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/textarea.md): Multi-line text input component with auto-resize, character counting, and validation support.

## Radix UI Components
- [Accordion](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/accordion.md): Displays collapsible content sections with smooth animations and keyboard navigation support.
- [Accordion Menu](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/accordion-menu.md): Navigation component with expandable sections, perfect for sidebar menus and hierarchical navigation.
- [Alert Dialog](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/alert-dialog.md): Modal dialog that interrupts user workflow to deliver important messages requiring immediate attention.
- [Avatar](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/avatar.md): User image component with fallback initials, status indicators, and customizable sizing.
- [Badge](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/badge.md): Small status indicator for notifications, counts, and labels with multiple color variants and sizes.
- [Breadcrumb](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/breadcrumb.md): Navigation trail showing current page location with customizable separators and responsive design.
- [Button](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/button.md): Interactive element with multiple variants, sizes, and states for user actions and form submissions.
- [Carousel](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/carousel.md): Image gallery and content slider with touch gestures, autoplay, and customizable navigation controls.
- [Checkbox](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/checkbox.md): Form input for multiple selections with indeterminate state, custom styling, and accessibility features.
- [Collapsible](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/collapsible.md): Content that can be shown or hidden with smooth animations and keyboard accessibility.
- [Command](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/command.md): Command palette interface with search, keyboard navigation, and customizable command execution.
- [Combobox](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/combobox.md): Searchable select input combining text input with dropdown list for enhanced user selection experience.
- [Context Menu](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/context-menu.md): Right-click menu that appears at cursor position with customizable actions and keyboard shortcuts.
- [Date Picker](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/date-picker.md): Calendar interface for date selection with range picking, keyboard navigation, and localization support.
- [Dialog](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/dialog.md): Modal overlay that captures focus and requires user interaction before dismissing or continuing.
- [Dropdown Menu](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/dropdown-menu.md): Action menu that appears below a trigger with keyboard navigation and submenu support.
- [Form](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/form.md): Form container with built-in validation, error handling, and integration with popular form libraries.
- [Filters](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/filters.md): Filters component with multiple filter types, operators, and visual indicators for data filtering.
- [Hover Card](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/hover-card.md): Contextual information panel that appears on hover with customizable delay and positioning.
- [Input](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/input.md): Text input field with validation states, error messages, and customizable styling options.
- [Label](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/label.md): Form field label with automatic association to inputs and screen reader accessibility.
- [Menubar](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/menubar.md): Application menu bar with nested menus, keyboard shortcuts, and cross-platform behavior.
- [Navigation Menu](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/navigation-menu.md): Website navigation with dropdown menus, keyboard navigation, and responsive mobile behavior.
- [Popover](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/popover.md): Floating content panel anchored to a trigger with customizable positioning and collision detection.
- [Progress](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/progress.md): Visual indicator showing task completion status with customizable appearance and animation.
- [Radio Group](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/radio-group.md): Single-choice selection group with keyboard navigation and proper form association.
- [Scroll Area](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/scroll-area.md): Custom scrollable container with styled scrollbars and smooth scrolling behavior.
- [Select](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/select.md): Dropdown selection component with search, keyboard navigation, and customizable options.
- [Separator](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/separator.md): Visual divider element with screen reader accessibility and customizable orientation.
- [Sheet](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/sheet.md): Slide-out panel component with customizable positioning, animations, and overlay behavior.
- [Slider](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/slider.md): Range input control with customizable steps, marks, and keyboard accessibility.
- [Sortable](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/sortable.md): Drag-and-drop list reordering with visual feedback and keyboard accessibility support.
- [Switch](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/switch.md): Toggle control for on/off states with smooth animations and keyboard accessibility.
- [Table](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/table.md): Data table with sorting, filtering, and responsive design for structured information display.
- [Tabs](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/tabs.md): Tabbed interface for organizing content with keyboard navigation and customizable styling.
- [Tooltip](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/tooltip.md): Contextual hint that appears on hover or focus with customizable positioning and delay.
- [Toggle](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/toggle.md): Two-state button control for toggling features with customizable pressed and unpressed states.
- [Toggle Group](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/toggle-group.md): Group of toggle buttons with shared state management and single or multiple selection modes.
- [Tree](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/tree.md): Hierarchical data display with expandable nodes, keyboard navigation, and customizable icons.

## Base UI Components
- [Accordion](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-accordion.md): Collapsible content sections with smooth expand/collapse animations and keyboard navigation support.
- [Alert Dialog](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-alert-dialog.md): Modal dialog that interrupts user workflow to deliver critical messages requiring immediate attention.
- [Autocomplete](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-autocomplete.md): Smart input field with dynamic suggestions and filtered results based on user typing.
- [Avatar](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-avatar.md): User profile image component with fallback initials, status indicators, and flexible sizing options.
- [Badge](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-badge.md): Compact status indicator for notifications, counts, and categorical labels with color variants.
- [Breadcrumb](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-breadcrumb.md): Navigation trail showing current page location with customizable separators and responsive design.
- [Button](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-button.md): Interactive element with multiple variants, sizes, and states for user actions and form submissions.
- [Checkbox](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-checkbox.md): Form input for multiple selections with indeterminate state, custom styling, and accessibility features.
- [Collapsible](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-collapsible.md): Content that can be shown or hidden with smooth animations and keyboard accessibility.
- [Combobox](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-combobox.md): Searchable select input combining text input with dropdown list for enhanced user selection experience.
- [Context Menu](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-context-menu.md): Right-click menu that appears at cursor position with customizable actions and keyboard shortcuts.
- [Dialog](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-dialog.md): Modal overlay that captures focus and requires user interaction before dismissing or continuing.
- [Input](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-input.md): Text input field with validation states, error messages, and customizable styling options.
- [Menu](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-menu.md): Action menu that appears below a trigger with keyboard navigation and submenu support.
- [Menubar](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-menubar.md): Application menu bar with nested menus, keyboard shortcuts, and cross-platform behavior.
- [Meter](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-meter.md): Visual indicator showing task completion status with customizable appearance and animation.
- [Navigation Menu](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-navigation-menu.md): Website navigation with dropdown menus, keyboard navigation, and responsive mobile behavior.
- [Number Field](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-number-field.md): Numeric input with increment/decrement controls, scrub area, and customizable step values.
- [Popover](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-popover.md): Floating content panel anchored to a trigger with customizable positioning and collision detection.
- [Preview Card](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-preview-card.md): Contextual information panel that appears on hover with customizable delay and positioning.
- [Progress](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-progress.md): Visual indicator showing task completion status with customizable appearance and animation.
- [Phone Input](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-phone-input.md): International phone number input with country selection, formatting, and validation support.
- [Radio Group](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-radio-group.md): Single-choice selection group with keyboard navigation and proper form association.
- [Select](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-select.md): Dropdown selection component with search, keyboard navigation, and customizable options.
- [Separator](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-separator.md): Visual divider element with screen reader accessibility and customizable orientation.
- [Switch](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-switch.md): Toggle control for on/off states with smooth animations and keyboard accessibility.
- [Scroll Area](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-scroll-area.md): Custom scrollable container with styled scrollbars and smooth scrolling behavior.
- [Slider](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-slider.md): Range input control with customizable steps, marks, and keyboard accessibility.
- [Sheet](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-sheet.md): Slide-out panel component with customizable positioning, animations, and overlay behavior.
- [Tabs](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-tabs.md): Tabbed interface for organizing content with keyboard navigation and customizable styling.
- [Toast](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-toast.md): Toast notification system with multiple positions, types, and customizable animations.
- [Toggle](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-toggle.md): Two-state button control for toggling features with customizable pressed and unpressed states.
- [Toggle Group](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-toggle-group.md): Group of toggle buttons with shared state management and single or multiple selection modes.
- [Toolbar](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-toolbar.md): Container component that groups a set of buttons and controls for organized tool layouts.
- [Tooltip](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/base-tooltip.md): Contextual hint that appears on hover or focus with customizable positioning and delay.

## Animated Components
- [Marquee](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/marquee.md): Scrolling text and content display with customizable speed, direction, and seamless loop animations.
- [GitHub Button](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/github-button.md): Interactive GitHub repository button with hover animations, star counts, and social integration features.
- [Avatar Group](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/avatar-group.md): Multiple user avatar display with overlap animations, hover effects, and customizable stacking patterns.
- [Typing Text](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/typing-text.md): Typewriter animation effect with customizable typing speed, cursor blinking, and character-by-character reveal.
- [Word Rotate](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/word-rotate.md): Rotating text animation that cycles through multiple words with smooth transitions and customizable timing.
- [Video Text](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/video-text.md): Video-based text effects using mask overlays and dynamic animations for immersive visual experiences.
- [SVG Text](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/svg-text.md): Animated SVG text with path drawing effects, morphing transitions, and vector-based animations.
- [Counting Number](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/counting-number.md): Animated number counter with easing functions, duration control, and smooth incremental transitions.
- [Sliding Number](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/sliding-number.md): Smooth number transitions with vertical sliding animations and customizable slide direction effects.
- [Shimmering Text](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/shimmering-text.md): Shimmer effect animation with customizable gradient colors, animation speed, and shimmer direction.
- [Text Reveal](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/text-reveal.md): Text reveal animations triggered by scroll position with intersection observer and customizable reveal effects.
- [Gradient Background](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/gradient-background.md): Animated gradient backgrounds with color transitions, movement effects, and customizable gradient patterns.
- [Grid Background](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/grid-background.md): Animated grid patterns with customizable spacing, movement effects, and dynamic grid line animations.
- [Hover Background](https://restrictui.strict-web.com/docs/hover-background.md): Interactive backgrounds that respond to mouse movement, hover states, and cursor position with dynamic effects.
